website_summaries.verdict: A good conference table option for temporary use. Convenient to store and move around for parties and special occasions.
pros: Folding mechanism makes it easy to retract the legs, creating a narrow profile for storage
Measures eight feet in length, which holds a number of people at once
Can be used with other conference tables to create a larger gathering space
cons: Table is heavy to move around repeatedly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with no sag.
customer_reviews.text: It is long so we were concerned about sag. We had five people seated for dinner with no sag. It is sturdy. The 45 degree support arms are offset toward the back so folks knees are less likely to hit the arms. Relatively light - one reasonably fit person can handle the setup. The shipping box arrived somewhat beat up but the table was ok. The table is in the back up against the wall in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Nova

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Beats a Lifetime Table!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered 5 ft conference tables from another mfg. Then I realized two things: These OTHER tables don't allow for seating on the end (when necessary) and while they were OK, they are definitely NOT sturdy like these 6 ft LIFETIME tables. Seeing these two products side by side really shows the difference in the construction of the entire table. I'm not complaining about the cheaper tables, but I know that LIFETIME is the way to go! (Who knows why I tried the other brand when all the tables I already have are LIFETIME!)
customer_reviews.author: Green Thumbs Up!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small room.
customer_reviews.text: Great table for classes or a room where you don't have a lot of space but need a table.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Conkle

customer_reviews.title: Nice extra foldable table to have around the house.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light weight, versatile fold away table to have around the house for parties and projects. It is sturdy but not for sitting on or placing heavy fragile objects: vases that are glass, delicate pottery that needs very stable base, fish tanks, etc. I liked having it delivered to my house rather than having to lug it home from Homedepot.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Well made but narrow
customer_reviews.text: Good looking table, interesting design and very narrow. I think this would work for some people, just not for my purpose. Appears to be well-made. Had the table with been bigger I would’ve given it five stars
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the lifetime products. They hold up well, and do the job they were designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: When I opened these tables both of them were very dirty. It looks like they were stored in a ...
customer_reviews.text: The boxes of the tables were beat to pieces and taped back together. One was even coming out of the box on one end. When I opened these tables both of them were very dirty. It looks like they were stored in a dusty environment. They are not as white as the lifetime table I have. I
customer_reviews.author: Mistie McKown

customer_reviews.title: Looks very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Open table ends up 1-1/2" LOWER in height from floor to top, than most standard folding tables. This was compared to 25 different folding tables in the same catering room/hall. Various companies , lengths/shapes. Looks very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Y S

customer_reviews.title: Typical Fantastic Lifetime Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality. The brackets and legs are substantial. The only drawback is that the top isn't completely smooth. Paper pads the texture enough but a smooth top would make this table top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: Short
customer_reviews.text: The table is an inch or two shorter than every other table in our office.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Nice tables at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice meeting room seminal tables at a good price for our ham radio club.
customer_reviews.author: R. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for setting up buffets without taking up too much floor space.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: JUST WHAT THE WIFE WANTED FOR THE PARTY ON THANKGIVING
customer_reviews.author: DON DELANO

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hobby table. The depth allows perfect reach for plastic modeling.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Used for coffee service table
customer_reviews.text: We needed a thin table to serve coffee in our small church foyer, this works perfect. Very sturdy & well made, just like other Lifetime tables we've used, tho a lot more expensive for the small size.
customer_reviews.author: D.A. Duehning

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than the ones without the angle brace.
customer_reviews.text: These are well made. Stronger than the ones without the angle brace. Commercial level
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Pay the extra bucks, you will thank me later.
customer_reviews.text: Look for the ones with the diagonal support. Bigger height adjustment buttons, less painful to push in.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Product is great for our use in a small area to make ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is great for our use in a small area to make the most out of the space and provide solid writing and learning surface.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Everything we expected. Set it up in the dining ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything we expected. Set it up in the dining room with a table cloth and set up refreshments plus a Keurig with cups and such. It has a long narrow footprint so it's unobtrusive for our use and fairly stable on carpeted surface.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Great buffet table
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a buffet table. Very sturdy and durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Smaller Width!  Perfect for what I needed it for!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table! I needed something to put my Christmas village on and this has worked out to be perfect. It sits close to the dining room table, it is sturdy and I have a table cloth long enough to hide the legs. Next year the tablecloth will hide the village house boxes so I do not have to put them all away and get them back out again. Perfect size width for areas that don’t need the larger size table.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Table Returned damaged!  A new one not sent!!!
customer_reviews.text: not happy, I ordered tables, one was damaged, sent it back, bot confirmation you received it and it was to be shipped with a new one! Have not seen it, have not heard from you nor Fed Ex who delivered the last ones and I am nor real happy with this. I needed it or would not have ordered it! Merle Woods
customer_reviews.author: merle helen woods

customer_reviews.title: Plants by window!
customer_reviews.text: Use these for the winter plants brought indoors by the windows - PERFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Seminar Table
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for use at our Church. It is exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: TerryLynne Marx

product_meta.title: LIFETIME 80176 Folding Conference Training Table, 6', White Granite
product_meta.description: Size:6'Lifetime 6-Foot Folding Conference Tables are constructed of high-density polyethylene and are the perfect size for a seminar or conference set-up. They will not crack, chip or peel, and are built for indoor and outdoor use. The patented steel frame design provides a sturdy foundation and is protected with a powder-coated, weather-resistant finish. Built for the rigors of demanding commercial use, Lifetime 8-Foot Folding Conference Tables meet BIFMA standards.
feature_bullets: Perfect for conferences, meetings or seminars
UV-Protected top is stain resistant and easy to clean
Backed by a limited lifetime manufacturer warranty
Perfect for conferences, meetings or seminars
72" x 18" Table is constructed of High Density Polyethylene for superior strength and durability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars63 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
